section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:addSouveniradjListEdge
Standard library adjListVertexAdminWindow
Class initializes AdminWindow UI and manages all Admin only permissive execution in editing user database, college database, souv database, etc bfs
Class uses a graph structure to perform a Breadth First Search confirmPage
Class sets breifs user on confirmation on trip planning actions confirmpageDbManager
SQL Database Manager class dfsGraph
DfsGraph class that uses an adjacency list to store edges edge
The edge struct Edgegraph
Graph data strcture for use in the BFS class graphAdjListgraphInfologinWindow
Class sets ui and manages execution for validating username and password LoginWindowtripPlannertripprogress
Class for displaying and calculating student trip progress, destinations, and student shopping cart for souverniers tripSummary
Class for generating and updating sql data from read DB and overall planned trip summary Vertex
Struct representing a vertex in the dfsGraph
